title: Report Illegal Dumping
description: A citizen reports that someone has illegally dumped a large amount of trash on a vacant public lot.

tasks.description: Gather the location and a description of the dumped materials.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately documents the citizen's report.

tasks.description: Create a service request for the sanitation department to investigate and clean up.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a new service ticket for the issue.

tasks.description: If the citizen has information about who dumped the trash, route a report to code enforcement or police.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent also routes the information to the proper enforcement agency.
